thread.title: customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: Wide range of clothing with good sales, yet the delivery takes too LON ....as if the parcel walks from the store to your house....it's been a week since I placed an order and I'm still waiting it to arrive from England to Greece...to Greece, not to Australia....
